column6: This comfortable studio is in the best part of Hyde Park. Walkable to tons of neighborhood restaurants, very cose to UT Campus, and a short cab ride downtown. There is one queen bed and a 6ft sofa for sleeping and relaxing. The unit is fully stocked with cookware/dishes, fresh linens/towels, and basic toiletries/supplies. \n\nThe property and neighborhood are great for getting to experience the unique vibe Austin is famous for!
